fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 394.01 lakh crore compared with Rs 202.96 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 37.50 points or 0.21% to settle at 17,858.20. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 1.03% to 15.28. RIL, Infosys and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2023.
